amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on continued support by the United States for a stable and democratic Republic of Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1795 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1795 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Martinez. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8014) To express the sense of Congress on continued support by the United States for a stable and democratic Republic of Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1795 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Martinez.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1795 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
